page.title: 08Hurworth then and now (cont)
page.content: Some people's favourite games were marbles and golf.The girls used to play skipping.Some people had a big sledge which held 6 people.They would go into the hedge or the river.They sometimes played whip & top and hopscotch they used to swim in the river until 1.30am.The bus was called the Gas Bag because it was like a double decker but was half full of gas.The Grange used to belong to the Spielmans.At night in Hurworth a man used go round with a gas pole and light the lamps.The railway station was at Croft Bank.The train went from Hurworth to Darlington.
